attributes.action: We would like Rt. Hon. Dr. Julian Lewis MP to be contactable by Email & Twitter
attributes.background: My MP is not contactable by email or Twitter. He also refuses to use www.writetothem.com  This makes it difficult for his constituents to contact him and hinders democracy.

rejection.details:
This is a choice for individual MPs to make, not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament as a whole.

You could start a new petition calling for all MPs to be required to use e-mail and Twitter.
